Title: Forging ahead in wind and waves
Publisher: Hubei renmin chubanshe (湖北人民出版社)
Notes: Mao on a boat in the Yangzi river, surrounded by young soldiers, Red Guards and some others in swimsuits. The image is an imaginative representation of Mao's swimming trip in 1966 (the number on the lifebuoy).This is a print from the third edition (August 1974).
Theme: Chairman Mao swims across the Yangzi
